Detailed Description

GenericClient class.

This class provides members and methods that make it easier to write simple client applications.

Definition at line 33 of file GenericClient.c.

static void runConnect ( void   )  [private]

Runs the generic client application with command CONNECT.

Definition at line 323 of file GenericClient.c.

00324 {
00325    for (;;)
00326    {
00327       if (client_connect())
00328       {
00329          genCli.state = CLI_ST_CONNECTED_IDLE;
00330          genCli.event = CLI_EVT_CONNECTION_CREATED;
00331          return;
00332       }
00333 
00334       if (!genCli.shouldRetryConnect)
00335       {
00336          genCli.event = CLI_EVT_CONNECT_ERROR;
00337          return;
00338       }
00339 
00340       client_sleep(1); // try again, but sleep 1 second, to avoid spinning
00341    } // for
00342 }
